BodyParameters.description: Required. The key that is returned from the upload Image request

examples.title: Example usage
examples.content:
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:3000/api/bouquets' \
--data-raw '{
    "name":"Tuli",
    "image":"Bouquet/77630c85-5038-4b80-b71f-f7158b0addc7.jpg",
    "bouquetCategory":"Tulips",
    "bouquetSentiment":"I Love You",
    "price":100,
    "count":10,
    "info":"Tulips are the most colorful of all spring flowers. They are also one of the easiest flowers you'll ever grow. Just plant the bulbs in fall for blossoms the following spring. There are hundreds of beautiful tulips to choose from, in enough colors, shapes, sizes and bloom times to inspire every gardener's creativity."
'}'/

QueryParameters.description: required the number of bouquets required in one page

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
[
    {
        "count": {
            "sold": 0,
            "available": 5
        },
        "_id": "6090ae8be91a4e1150085d41",
        "name": "Tulip",
        "price": 100,
        "info": "Tulips are the most colorful of all spring flowers. They are also one of the easiest flowers you'll ever grow. Just plant the bulbs in fall for blossoms the following spring. There are hundreds of beautiful tulips to choose from, in enough colors, shapes, sizes and bloom times to inspire every gardener's creativity.",
        "bouquetCategory": "Tulips",
        "bouquetSentiment": "I Love You",
        "images": "Bouquet/77630c85-5038-4b80-b71f-f7158b0addc7.jpg",
        "__v": 0
    }
]

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
    "count": {
        "sold": 0,
        "available": 10
    },
    "_id": "6090ae8be91a4e1150085d41",
    "name": "Tuli",
    "price": 100,
    "info": "Tulips are the most colorful of all spring flowers. They are also one of the easiest flowers you'll ever grow. Just plant the bulbs in fall for blossoms the following spring. There are hundreds of beautiful tulips to choose from, in enough colors, shapes, sizes and bloom times to inspire every gardener's creativity.",
    "bouquetCategory": "Tulips",
    "bouquetSentiment": "I Love You",
    "images": "Bouquet/77630c85-5038-4b80-b71f-f7158b0addc7.jpg",
    "__v": 0
}

BodyParameters.description: The key that is returned from the upload Image request

    "_id": "6090ae8be91a4e1150085d41",
    "name": "Tulip",
    "price": 100,
    "count": {

There are hundreds of beautiful tulips to choose from, in enough colors, shapes, sizes and bloom times to inspire every gardener's creativity.",

    "__v": 0

title: Upload Image
name: Upload_Image
description:
Get Presigned Url Of an Image



Request Parameters



Endpoint

BodyParameters.description: Required. Type of the category of the image

examples.title: Example usage:

title: Get All Plants
name: Get_All_Plants
description: this request retruns all the plant in the database and doesn't return the plants tips.

QueryParameters.description: max number of plants displayed in the page
when true the tips of the plants are returned

Success 200.description: array of strings returned if the hasTips parameter is true

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Get Plant By Id
name: Get_Plant_By_Id
description: this request retruns all the plant info.

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK

    {
         "count": {
         "sold": 0,
         "available": 6
         },
         "image": "Plant/e5f2a7a5-061f-492f-8e98-27d049cc9bf6.jpg",
         "_id": "608fe99514f3af4878571a6a",
         "name": "bleeding heart",
         "type": "flower",
         "price": 600,
         "info": "The old-fashioned bleeding heart is a favorite perennial of the shady flower garden and was called the finest hardy plant of the 19th century."
         "tips": [
                 "Plant in the spring after the threat of frost has passed.",
                 "Plant in the shade.",
                 "Add compost to the soil before planting.",
                 "Soak the soil around the plant until moist.",
                 "Add mulch to keep moisture in and weeds out."
                 ]
     }

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
